title: Noise not sound
brief_description: Distinguishes between natural sounds of the environment and excessive, harmful sounds made by humans. Defines sound pollution, tracing historical background, scientific experimentaiton and solutions to sound pollution. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
